languages.text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Карьеры, добывающие взрывоопасный фузелиновый песок, не зря зовут полями смерти — они поглотят любой объем живой силы.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
languages.original_text: Каторжан стало больше, чем работы для них. Карьеры, добывающие взрывоопасный фузелиновый песок, не зря зовут полями смерти — они поглотят любой объем живой силы.

traits.locale_text: There are now more convicts than tasks to fulfil. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
There is now more convicts than work for them. The quarries extracting fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any number of living workers.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
There are now more convicts than tasks to fulfil. The quarries extracting fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
There are now more convicts than tasks to fulfil. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

languages.text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Les carrières qui extraient du sable de fyceline explosif sont qualifiées à juste titre de champs de la mort, car de nombreux ouvriers y perdent la vie.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

traits.locale_text: Il y a maintenant plus de condamnés que de travail. Les carrières qui extraient du sable de fyceline explosif sont qualifiées à juste titre de champs de la mort, car de nombreux ouvriers y perdent la vie.

languages.text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。このファイセリン燃料砂を採取する採石場は、まさに殺戮の地と呼ばれるにふさわしい。生きている労働者を次々と死に追い込む。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

traits.locale_text: 今や囚人の数は仕事の数を上回っている。このファイセリン燃料砂を採取する採石場は、まさに殺戮の地と呼ばれるにふさわしい。生きている労働者を次々と死に追い込む。

languages.text: 犯人的数量已经远远超出工作需要。负责开采火药原石的矿场又被称作“吃人矿坑”，多余的犯人随时会在这里被消耗掉。
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

traits.locale_text: 犯人的数量已经远远超出工作需要。负责开采火药原石的矿场又被称作“吃人矿坑”，多余的犯人随时会在这里被消耗掉。

languages.text: Ahora hay más presos que tareas que cumplir. Las canteras que extraen la explosiva arena de fycelina se llaman, con razón, campos de exterminio. Consumen cualquier cantidad de mano de obra viva.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

traits.locale_text: Ahora hay más presos que tareas que cumplir. Las canteras que extraen la explosiva arena de fycelina se llaman, con razón, campos de exterminio. Consumen cualquier cantidad de mano de obra viva.

languages.text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Die Steinbrüche, in denen explosiver Fycelin-Sand gewonnen wird, werden aus gutem Grund auch Todesfelder genannt — sie verschlingen unendlich viele Arbeitskräfte.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.

traits.locale_text: Es gibt jetzt mehr Sträflinge als Arbeit. Die Steinbrüche, in denen explosiver Fycelin-Sand gewonnen wird, werden aus gutem Grund auch Todesfelder genannt — sie verschlingen unendlich viele Arbeitskräfte.

languages.text: An itibarıyla mahkûmların sayısı, yapabilecekleri işlerin sayısını aşmış durumda. Patlayıcı fiselin kumu çıkarılan yerlere katliam ocakları diyorlar. Sayısız işçi burada çalışarak ömrünü yitiriyor.
languages.original_text: There are now more convicts than there is work to go around. The quarries extracting explosive fyceline sand are rightfully called killing fields — they will consume any amount of living labour.
